column4: Tesla makes 7 400 Model 3s so far in October: Electrek
column5: Tesla Inc  has produced more than 11 500 cars  including about 7 400 Model 3s  so far this month  automotive news website Electrek reported on Friday  citing a source familiar with the matter.

column4: Tesla makes 7 400 Model 3s so far in Oct -Electrek
column5: Oct 12 Tesla Inc has produced more than 11 500 cars  including about 7 400 Model 3s  so far this month  automotive news website Electrek reported https://electrek.co/2018/10/12/tesla-model-3-production-strong-quarter on Friday  citing a source familiar with the matter.

column4: Tesla says orders placed by Oct 15 eligible for full tax credit
column5: Electric carmaker Tesla Inc said http://bit.ly/2NCbs1r orders for cars placed by Oct. 15 will be eligible for a full federal tax credit of $7 500 and these customers will get their cars delivered by the end of the year.

column4: UPDATE 1-Tesla says orders placed by Oct 15 eligible for full tax credit
column5: Oct 12 Electric carmaker Tesla Inc said http://bit.ly/2NCbs1r orders for cars placed by Oct. 15 will be eligible for a full federal tax credit of $7 500 and these customers will get their cars delivered by the end of the year.

column4: Tesla says orders placed by Oct 15 eligible for full tax credit
column5: Oct 12 Electric carmaker Tesla Inc said http://bit.ly/2NCbs1r all orders for its vehicles placed by Oct. 15 are eligible for full federal tax credit of $7 500 and such customers will get their cars delivered by the end of the year.

column4: BMW to buy control of China venture in 'new era' for foreign carmakers
column5: SHENYANG  China Germany's BMW  will pay 3.6 billion euros ($4.2 billion) to take control of its main joint venture in China  the first such move by a global carmaker as Beijing starts to relax ownership rules for the world's biggest auto market. | Video

column4: UPDATE 6-BMW to buy control of China venture in 'new era' for foreign carmakers
column5: * JV will spend 3 bln euros expanding Shenyang facility (Adds Brilliance share price fall on Friday)

column4: Intel reduces stake in ASML to below 3 percent
column5: AMSTERDAM Intel  has reduced its stake in supplier ASML Holding  to just below 3 percent  according to an update from the registry of the Netherlands' Authority for Financial Markets (AFM) on Friday.

column4: Intel reduces stake in ASML to below 3 percent
column5: AMSTERDAM  Oct 12 Intel has reduced its stake in supplier ASML Holding to just below 3 percent  according to an update from the registry of the Netherlands' Authority for Financial Markets (AFM) on Friday.
